thread.section_title: Hotel Elysees Opera - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Enjoyable Stay
thread.title_full: Enjoyable Stay - Review of Hotel Elysees Opera, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Rosejess
title: Enjoyable Stay
text:
We stayed for 2 nights & were surprised how good the hotel was after reading some of the awful reviews! Reception staff very friendly, rooms larger than we expected (have had smaller ones than these) & a very good breakfast. For a 3* hotel you couldn't expect more. Convenient to 3 metro stations & a good location. Would go to this hotel again.
Room Tip: Our 5th floor rooms had balconies. See more room tips
